biotools.summary: iReceptor is a data discovery platform that facilitates the curation, analysis and sharing of antibody/B-cell and T-cell receptor repertoires (Adaptive Immune Receptor Repertoire or AIRR-seq data) and related subject and sample metadata from multiple studies across many labs and institutions.

bioschemas.name: iReceptor
